on reading compounds: 瞋恚【シンイ】dosa (ill will, antipathy), irateness, anger
kun reading compounds: 怒る【おこる】to get angry, to get mad, to tell someone off, to scold, to be angular, to be square
怒らす【いからす】to anger, to displease, to offend, to square (one's shoulders), to make stern (e.g. eyes), to raise (one's voice) in anger
